reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Richards is a great teacher who explains complex topics well, but her exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Wong is very engaging and makes the subject fascinating. His lectures are a must-attend.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: The material is tough, and Dr. Parker's lectures can be a bit dry. Be prepared to study a lot on your own.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is passionate about history and makes every class interesting. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Spanish Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Gonzalez is very knowledgeable, but the workload is heavy. You will learn a lot, though.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's lectures are hard to follow, and he doesn't always clarify difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: The course material is dense, and Dr. Patel moves quickly. It's important to keep up with the readings.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is an amazing professor who makes coding accessible to everyone. Great for beginners!

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's classes are discussion-heavy, which is great, but be prepared to participate.

reviews.subject: Advanced Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit monotonous. Good for self-studiers.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Davis brings real-world examples to class, making the subject matter relatable and interesting.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Dr. Brown encourages critical thinking and makes philosophy accessible and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor knows her stuff, but the course is fast-paced. Be prepared to study outside of class.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are clear, and he provides plenty of resources for understanding the material.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is passionate about art and makes every lecture a visual treat. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Miller's classes are very theory-heavy and can be difficult to follow without prior knowledge.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. White provides insightful analysis of texts, but the reading load is significant.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be dry. Best for those with a strong interest in the subject.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is engaging and makes anthropology fascinating. Her fieldwork stories are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Adams explains complex economic theories in a way that's easy to understand. Great for those new to the subject.
